name: Seer

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally RESIST in all Battles by 40.

skills.name: Knock Out
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 15% chance of granting an Extra Turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Clan Banner
skills.raw_description:
Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Places a 25% [Weaken] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. * Weaken
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Karma Burn
skills.raw_description:
Removes all buffs from all allies and enemies, then attacks all enemies. Damage increases according to the number of buffs removed.
Damage based on: [ATK] [Enemy MAX HP]
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
